newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria cbank cuts main interest rate to 6.12 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria cbank cuts main interest rate to 6.12 pct.

text.p: The Bulgarian National Bank cut on Thursday the annual simple main interest rate to 6.12 percent from 6.96 percent effective from Monday, dealers said.
"The BNB informed us that it reduces the simple annual main interest rate to 6.12 percent effective from July 21," said commercial bank dealer.
Central bank officials were no immediately available for comment.
Interest rates have come down to 0.58 percent monthly from 18 percent in March, reflecting a stabilisation trend of the economy following an IMF reform and funding deal reached in March.
On July 1 Bulgaria entered a restrictive fixed exchange rate regime aimed at restoring confidence in the financial system. -- Sofia Newsroom +359-2 981 4145
